details.title: TV space surveillance system
details.abstract: This article represents the research results of the television space surveillance system, or, in other words, the optical surveillance system. The purpose of the work is the design of a specialized optical surveillance system, stabilization and surveillance equipment, and a television unit. The system's simplified structural and functional scheme is described, as well as its justification and operation principle. The application prospects are estimated.
details.journal_title: IEEE Aerospace and Electronic Systems Magazine
